document_data.mainbody:
he Thunder Way was a wagon track passing through High Dale, connecting Saerb in Sembia to Thunderstone in Cormyr.
From Thunderstone to SaerbOn the 4-edition map in Forgotten Realms Campaign Guide, the Thunder Way is shown as much longer and including all of the Hullack Trail.
*Thunderstone
*Twoswords Bridge, where it crosses Baerasts Stream
*Saerb
